name: Jumbo Throne
description:
The game was done in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 45 game jam with the theme "Start with nothing".

Jumbo Throne is a game where you have to build your own go-kart. You have no money and no parts. Just a blueprint! You can get money by doing chores around the neighbourhood.

After almost giving up on this game on day 2, I somehow managed to pull it off. I couldn’t finish all the things I had planned for it turned out ok. I spent the most time on the South Park inspired art style. At the end, after you completed the go-kart, there was supposed to be a race level but I had no time to finish it. Mabye I might do it in a post-jam version.
